headline: Verizon Outage Ends — And The Stock Is Bracing For The Damage
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) suffered a nationwide outage in the United States on Wednesday that upset customers, led to some unwanted emergency alerts being sent out, and prevented people from calling or texting. While the outage is over, the impact on Verizon stock is still to come with the company promising account credits. Verizon Outage Could Hurt VZ Stock Verizon customers were unable to use text, voice or data services for hours on Wednesday, leading to complaints across the country.
